FRESH FROM THE FARM

Ovo Farm Eggs originate from a beautiful rural expanse in Balangir. Temperate climate, clean air, hygienic environment and a technologically advanced layer farm akin to global standards ensure happy and healthy hens lay high-quality eggs.

HAPPY BIRDS = HAPPY EGGS

With an experience of over 2 decades in Poultry Farming, we have identified and adopted all advanced processes in our farm. From maintaining healthy flock and hygienic barn areas to rigorous quality assurance testing, we ensure Ovo Farm Eggs meet top European standard
